mapper.insert: insert into reply (reply_id, title, user_id, publishtime, modifytime, topic_id, start_time, end_time) values (#{replyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{publishtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update reply set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, publishtime = #{publishtime,jdbcType=DATE}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=DATE}, topic_id = #{topicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where reply_id = #{replyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select reply_id, title, user_id, publishtime, modifytime, topic_id, start_time, end_time from reply
